FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: Useless primary key

FIELD.NAME: cmid
FIELD.COMMENT: Course module this teameval is associated with

FIELD.NAME: contextid
FIELD.COMMENT: If cmid is null, then this teameval is a template. Templates are associated with a context represented by this contextid. If cmid is set this does not need to be set.

FIELD.NAME: enabled
FIELD.COMMENT: If evaluation is enabled for this course module

FIELD.NAME: public
FIELD.COMMENT: If the questionnaire for this puppy is public. Otherwise it is only available within the course or course category depending on site-wide settings.

FIELD.NAME: self
FIELD.COMMENT: True if self-assessment is enabled for this team evaluation

FIELD.NAME: fraction
FIELD.COMMENT: The percentage of the evaluation score that is used to calculate a user's final score.

FIELD.NAME: noncompletionpenalty
FIELD.COMMENT: The penalty for non-completion of the evaluation form.

FIELD.NAME: deadline
FIELD.COMMENT: Last possible date for submission of the questionnaire by users.

FIELD.NAME: autorelease
FIELD.COMMENT: Automatically release marks to users. On by default

FIELD.NAME: title
FIELD.COMMENT: For templates

FIELD.NAME: teamevalid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the teameval this question belongs to

FIELD.NAME: qtype
FIELD.COMMENT: Subplugin identifier for teamevalquestion subplugin

FIELD.NAME: questionid
FIELD.COMMENT: Instance id for the subplugin's own database tables

FIELD.NAME: ordinal
FIELD.COMMENT: Ordering number for questions

FIELD.NAME: cmid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course module to which this teameval belongs

FIELD.NAME: level
FIELD.COMMENT: 0 = RELEASE_ALL 1 = RELEASE_GROUP 2 = RELEASE_USER

FIELD.NAME: target
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the group or user whose marks are being released. 0 if level == RELEASE_ALL.

FIELD.NAME: questionid
FIELD.COMMENT: Question ID for the response

FIELD.NAME: markerid
FIELD.COMMENT: User ID of the respondant

FIELD.NAME: targetid
FIELD.COMMENT: User ID of the user the feedback is for

FIELD.NAME: state
FIELD.COMMENT: -1 for rescinded, 0 for unset, 1 for approved.
